Bio

Hi, I am a Software Engineer who loves to solve problems and build things that makes a difference. Currently, I work at Adrosonic as a Research & Innovation Engineer, developing Intelligent Automation and Generative AI solutions leveraging tools like Python, React, OpenAI, UiPath, and Power Platform. I'm passionate about designing Full Stack solutions and love experimenting with various technologies like React, Node, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, GO, and C++ among others. Always excited to explore new technologies and build cool projects along the way! If you'd like to connect, reach out to me on LinkedIn or drop an email.

Bat Bot GitHub

The Batman Project! A dynamic web application where users can engage in conversations with a chatbot themed with the personality of Batman. The backend is powered by Python, deployed on Render, and utilizes the Gemini API for natural language processing.

About Me
